site.name: Jacare
site.title: Jacare | Retro ROM Library Manager
site.description: Jacare is an open-source, web-based desktop ROM library manager with persistent downloads, Crocdb enrichment, and an ultra-responsive UI. Organize your retro gaming collection with smart metadata and seamless download management.
site.keywords: ROM manager, retro gaming, emulator, game library, ROM collection, Crocdb, open source, desktop app, game metadata, retro games, ROM organizer, game collection manager, emulation

organization.name: Jacare
organization.description: Open-source ROM library manager for retro gaming enthusiasts
